casebody.data:
No. 8,

Misc.

Lott v. Texas. Petitioner pro se. Waggoner Carr, Attorney General of Texas; Hawthorne Phillips, First Assistant Attorney General, T. B. Wright, Executive Assistant Attorney General, and Howard M. Fender and Alio B. Crow, Jr., Assistant Attorneys General, for respondent.

Ct. Crim App. Tex.
